source.aba079f4: # 3) The correlation between third shot and new cases, new severe cases and new death (2021-07-01 to 2021-11-08)
source.e85fbcc8: # 2) The correlation between First and second shots, and new cases, new severe cases and new death (2021-01-17 to 2021-05-31)
source.803cd584: # To find the effectiveness of first shot and second shot, I look into the correlation of the data between 2021-01-17 and 2021-05-31. And to find the effectiveness of third shot, I also look into the correlation of the data between 2021-07-01 and 2021-11-08.
source.0892d604:
# The correlation between first and second shots, and each cases are 
# * New cases vaccinated -0.5
# * New cases Not vaccinated -0.9
# * New Death vaccinated -0.4 to -0.5
# * New Death Not vaccinated -0.9
# * New Severe cases vaccinated -0.4 to -0.5
# * New severe cases Not vaccinated -0.9

# It shows that vaccination have strong negative correlation with not vaccinated new case, new severe cases and new death ! It may show that first and second shot helped not only vaccinated people but also not vaccinated people to prevent wide spread by vaccinated people.
source.e8127798:
# The correlation between third and each cases are 
# * New cases vaccinated -0.3
# * New cases expired Vaccination 0.1
# * New cases Not vaccinated 0.2
# * New Death vaccinated 0.0
# * New Death expired Vaccination -0.0
# * New Death Not vaccinated 0.5
# * New Severe cases vaccinated -0.4 to -0.4
# * New severe cases expired Vaccination -0.2
# * New severe cases Not vaccinated 0.3

# It shows that no vaccination have positive correlation with new severe cases and new death ! It may show that covid-19 may be more infected among not vaccinated people, and no vaccination cause serious conditions. And compared to first and second shots, the negative correlation between shot and cases are not so strong. It may come from time lag between vaccine and its effectiveness. Or it may show that third shot may not so effective than first and second shots.
source.bebae1da: # When I look at the time series chart, vaccine shots seem to be effective to reduce new death. So I tried to find the correlation between vaccine shot and new cases, new severe cases and new death.
